Node.Caption: Страны
Node.SQL: SELECT COUNTRYID, COUNTRYNAME, COUNTRYNAME_RUS, COUNTRYNAME_ENG, COUNTRYTYPE, A2, A3, CITIZENSHIPTYPEID, USE FROM GUIDE_COUNTRY order by COUNTRYNAME

Node.Caption: Области
Node.SQL: SELECT REGIONID, REGIONNAME, USE FROM GUIDE_REGION order by 1

Node.Caption: Специальности
Node.SQL: SELECT SPECIALITYID, CODE, SPECIALITY, SPECIALITY_ENG, QUALIFICATION, EDULEVELID, EDUDIRECTIONID as EDUDIRECTIONID_LOOKUP, EDUDIRECTION_RASPID as EDUDIRECTION_RASPID_LOOKUP, STRUCTUREID, USE FROM GUIDE_SPECIALITY order by 1

Node.Caption: Направления подготовки
Node.SQL: select EDUDIRECTIONID, EDUDIRECTION, EDUDIRECTION_CODE, USE from GUIDE_EDUDIRECTION order by 1

Node.Caption: Направления распределения
Node.SQL: select EDUDIRECTION_RASPID, EDUDIRECTION_RASP, USE from GUIDE_EDUDIRECTION_RASP order by 1

Node.Caption: Подразделения
Node.SQL: SELECT DEPARTMENTID, DEPARTMENT, DEPARTMENT_ENG, DEPARTMENT_RUS, DEPARTMENT_CASE2, DEPARTMENT_CASE6, DEPARTMENTTYPE, DEPARTMENT_RUS_CASE2, DEPARTMENT_RUS_CASE6, BOSSID, USE FROM GUIDE_DEPARTMENT order by 1

Node.Caption: Дисциплины
Node.SQL: SELECT DISCIPLINEID, DISCIPLINE, DISCIPLINE_RUS, DISCIPLINE_ENG, DISCIPLINETYPE, USE FROM GUIDE_DISCIPLINE order by 1

Node.Caption: Места распределения
Node.SQL: SELECT APPOINTMENTID, APPOINTMENT, SUBORDINATION, USE FROM GUIDE_APPOINTMENT order by 1

Node.Caption: Должности
Node.SQL: SELECT POSTID, POST, USE FROM GUIDE_POST order by 1

Node.Caption: Статус учреждения здравоохранения
Node.SQL: SELECT HOSPITALSTATUSID, HOSPITALSTATUS, USE FROM GUIDE_HOSPITALSTATUS order by 1

Node.Caption: Тип учреждения здравоохранения
Node.SQL: SELECT HOSPITALTYPEID, HOSPITALTYPE, USE FROM GUIDE_HOSPITALTYPE order by 1

Node.Caption: Семейное положение
Node.SQL: SELECT FAMILYSTATUS, FAMILYSTATUSNAME, FAMILYSTATUSNAME_RUS FROM GUIDE_FAMILYSTATUS order by 1

Node.Caption: Формы обучения
Node.SQL: SELECT EDUFORMID, EDUFORM, EDUFORM_CASE2, EDUFORM_CASE4, EDUFORM_CASE5, EDUFORM_CASE6, EDUFORM_RUS, EDUFORM_RUS_CASE2, EDUFORM_RUS_CASE4, USE FROM GUIDE_EDUFORM order by 1

Node.Caption: Сроки обучения
Node.SQL: SELECT EDUTERM, EDUTERMNAME, EDUTERMNAME_RUS, USE FROM GUIDE_EDUTERM order by 1

Node.Caption: Формы контроля
Node.SQL: SELECT FORMREPORT, FORMREPORTNAME, FORMREPORTNAME_RUS, USE FROM GUIDE_FORMREPORT order by 1

Node.Caption: Формы контроля(ECTS)
Node.SQL: select FORMREPORT, FORMREPORTNAME, FORMREPORTNAME_RUS, USE from GUIDE_FORMREPORT_B order by 1

Node.Caption: Руководители
Node.SQL: select EMP_ID, EMP_POST, EMP_POSTFULL, EMP_POSTFULL_ENG, EMP_FIO, EMP_FIO_ENG, EMP_DEGREE from GUIDE_EMPLOYER order by 1

Node.Caption: Оценки ECTS
Node.SQL: select ECTSID, ECTS, ECTS_PERCENT, TRADITIONAL_MARK, CREDITS_MIN from GUIDE_ECTS order by 1

Node.Caption: Традиционные оценки
Node.SQL: select TRADITIONAL_MARKID, TRADITIONAL_MARK, MARKSTR, MARKSTR_RUS, MARKSTR_ENG, CREDITS_MIN, MARKSTR_C, MARKSTR_ENG_C from GUIDE_TRADITIONAL_MARK order by 1 desc

Node.Caption: Оценки ECTS (доп.)
Node.SQL: select MARKID, MARKNAME, MARKSTR, MARKNAME_RUS, MARKSTR_RUS, USE from GUIDE_MARKTYPE_B order by 1 desc

Node.Caption: Учебные параметры
Node.SQL: select PARAMETERID, PARAMETERNAME, PARAMETERVALUE, USE from EDUPARAMETERS order by 1

Node.Caption: Семестры
Node.SQL: select SEMESTER, USE from GUIDE_SEMESTER order by 1

Node.Caption: Учебные года
Node.SQL: select EDUYEAR, EDUYEARSTR, USE from GUIDE_EDUYEAR order by 1

Node.Caption: Виды стипендий
Node.SQL: select GG.GRANTID, GG.TITLE, GG.SHORTTITLE, GG.SUMMA, GG.TYPEGRANTS from GUIDE_GRANT GG order by 1

Node.Caption: КОАТУУ
Node.SQL: select GG.KOATUUCODE, GG.TYPEKOATUU, GG.TITLE, GG.USE from GUIDE_KOATUU GG order by 1
